message: What are the best blender options out there?

just go to target or some department store and pick the one you are happy with. If you don't like it, just return it. I think it is hard to tell the reviews from the marketing agents (positive or negative) on the websites.

IMO Vitamix are expensive but worth it. I've had mine for four years and use it at least twice a week to blend things like frozen strawberries and it's still like new. I bought mine from Costco when the Vitamix group was there demonstrating them.
